parameters.name: ActionPlanName
parameters.description: The name of the execution plan.

parameters.name: AllocationSpec
parameters.description:
The type of the resource.

*   Standard
*   Dedicated: You must enable a whitelist for use.
*   Economic: You must enable a whitelist for use.

parameters.name: DesiredCapacity
parameters.description: The expected scale of resources for the execution plan. If the ResourceType parameter is set to VcpuCapacity, the execution plan is expected to have 10000 vCPUs.

parameters.name: Level
parameters.description:
The computing power level. This value is valid only when the resource type is Economic. The following disk categories are supported:

*   General
*   Performance

Default value: General

parameters.name: PrologScript
parameters.description: The pre-processing script. Base64 encoding is required.

parameters.name: Regions
parameters.description: The list of resource configurations in the region where the execution plan runs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
Target resource type: the capacity of vCPUs or the number of execution nodes. Valid values:

*   VCpuCapacity
*   ExecutorCapacity

parameters.name: Resources
parameters.description: The list of resource configurations of the execution plan runtime environment. You can configure 1 to 10 resources.

parameters.name: Script
parameters.description: The running-job script. Base64 encoding is required.
